snippet: The victim was shot during an argument outside an apartment building that has a history of drug activity, the authorities said.
abstract: New York City police say they are on hunt for man who fatally shot Lionell McClean of Brooklyn outside apartment building in Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: The victim was shot during an argument outside an apartment building that has a history of drug activity, the authorities said.

headline.main: Police Seek Suspect After Fatal Brooklyn Shooting
headline.print_headline: Suspect Is Sought  in Brooklyn Killing
